name: Chemistry Kombat I
description:
Learning science has never been so easy! Chemistry Kombat I - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 8th class Chemistry. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Chemistry Kombat I to clear your fundamental concepts.
Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Eduisfun games have topped the Trending list on Google Play. Learn Chemistry in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics
Synthetic Fibres and Plastics
Metals and Non-Metals
Coal and Petroleum
Combustion & Flame
Pollution of Air and Water
